    <h2 id="autogen.cache.in_memory_cache.InMemoryCache" class="doc doc-heading">
        <code class="doc-symbol doc-symbol-heading doc-symbol-class"></code>
        <span class="doc doc-object-name doc-class-name">InMemoryCache</span>
        <a href="#autogen.cache.in_memory_cache.InMemoryCache" class="headerlink" title="Permanent link"></a>
    </h2>

```python
InMemoryCache(seed: str | int = '')
```

    This protocol defines the basic interface for cache operations.
    Implementing classes should provide concrete implementations for
    these methods to handle caching mechanisms.

<b>Parameters:</b>
| Name | Description |
|--|--|
| `seed` | **Type:** `str \| int`<br/><br/>**Default:** '' |
